Launching gtsam.org

May 20, 2019

GTSAM Posts

Today we launched GTSAM’s new web presence, gtsam.org. The site is hosted by Github Pages, and is generated via Jekyll, a simple static website generator.

At the moment, the page still looks rather spartan, but we’ll add a little more design features as time goes on. Plans also call for blog posts (such as this one) and tutorials, on factor graphs and on GTSAM’s implementation of it.

GTSAM

  • GTSAM
  • frank.dellaert@gtsam.org
  • borglab
  • gtsam4

GTSAM is a BSD-licensed C++ library that implements sensor fusion for robotics and computer vision using factor graphs.
